roasts.name: Ethiopia Raro Nansebo Natural
roasts.tasting_notes: Great Ethiopian. Satisfyingly bright. Sweet, complex. Coconuts, berries, tea.

roasts.name: Brazil Sitio Santo Antonio
roasts.tasting_notes: Solid classic coffee flavors. Notes of coffee with hints of coffee. You want a coffee? This is coffee. Put it in your diner mug and do your best Agent Cooper impression. Flawlessly unexciting, vaguely sweet, mildly chocolatey.
